abstract: The lofty price Microsoft paid AOL for 800 patents — $1.3 million each — reflects the crucial role patents are playing in the business and legal strategies of technology companies.
snippet: The lofty price Microsoft paid AOL for 800 patents — $1.3 million each — reflects the crucial role patents are playing in the business and legal strategies of technology companies.
lead_paragraph: The global gold rush in technology patents gained speed on Monday when Microsoft agreed to pay more than $1 billion for 800 patents held by AOL.

headline.main: Microsoft’s AOL Deal Intensifies Patent Wars
headline.print_headline: Microsoft’s AOL Deal Intensifies Patent Wars
